messages.subject: THANK YOU
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to say thanks to Joyce and all the other moms who replied to my email.  It will take me quite some time to go through all of the information you
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to say thanks to Joyce and all the other moms who replied to my
email. It will take me quite some time to go through all of the information
you provided, but I REALLY appreciate it! All 3 of our boys will be
swimming in a swim meet tomorrow, so we are all off to bed to get enough
sleep. I have slowly been trying to shift to unschooling principles and not
being the "controlling" mom. I have to admit, I have always liked structure
and organization, but realize the importance of allowing my children freedom
to make their own choices. I do not have anyone dictating a bedtime, hair
style or food choices to me so why did I think my children were not smart
enough to do that on their own?



Thanks so much for all of the information. I still have lots of questions
and will definitely be asking away as soon as I sift through all of the
awesome info sent my way.

You gals are awesome and SO inspiring!!



God bless,

Kelly G in Fl



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
